metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27746 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Slurm before 19.05.8 and 20.x before 20.02.6 exposes Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor because xauth for X11 magic cookies is affected by a race condition in a read operation on the /proc filesystem.

criterions.comment: slurm-llnl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
